name: tdrgtmd

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, ctdrg), wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c0, ctrg))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ TopDRing, c0 ∈ TopMnd, c0 ∈ TopRing)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctdrg), wcel(c0, ctmd))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctdrg), wcel(c0, ctrg))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, ctmd))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopDRing → c0 ∈ TopMnd)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopDRing → c0 ∈ TopRing)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopRing → c0 ∈ TopMnd)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctdrg), wcel(c0, ctmd))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctdrg), wcel(c0, ctrg))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, ctmd))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopDRing → c0 ∈ TopMnd)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopDRing → c0 ∈ TopRing)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopRing → c0 ∈ TopMnd)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctdrg), wcel(c0, ctmd))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, ctmd))
cumulated.pretty:

comment: A topological division ring is a topological monoid. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)
